*Mostly Responsive*

Our project fulfils our goal of detecting the legitimacy of a URL

Progress Along The Way

We have a finalized project with a front end design that is state of the art web design

Easy to Use

Our product is straight forward and easy to use!

Explaining the why

This project is for phishing website detection. Our great profesor gave us the mental push we needed to come up with the idea of creating an app that protects individuals and businesses in the cyber space

The Importance Of Cybersecurity

The problem we are trying to solve with this app is important because phishing attacks effect millions worldwide. They are the cause of things like identity theft, financial fraud, ransomeware, and many other cyber attacks.

Roadblocks Along The Way

Of course, there were roadblocks along the way. One of the main issues was the functionality of our code, and also trying to access a backend database from the front end section. Although there were blockers, this project helped us expand on our technical & team skills.
